Kirsten Gillibrand has garnered positive attention recently for her roles in the repeal of the don't ask, don't tell law for gay troops and the passage of legislation to provide benefits to Sept. 11 responders. The poll found 52% of those surveyed saying they would re-elect Kirsten Gillibrand . She faces re-election in 2012.

Mike Pence Grace Napolitano ( D-Calif.), co-chair of the Congressional Mental Health Caucus, said last week that the Arizona shooting will cause lawmakers to revisit that law. How do we allow people to be assured that nobody who is unstable gets a hold of ammunition and guns? Grace Napolitano said in a phone interview.`` I'm sure we'll touch upon it.'' But even Capitol Hill's staunchest gun-control advocates aren't holding their breath for reforms in the 112th Congress.
